steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6h832","text":"To purify BCL2L13-GST, fuse the cytosol-exposed domain of BCL2L13 (1-463aa) to a C-terminal GST-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (available on Addgene).
